title: Session 1: reproducible workflows
description: First session to kick-off the group & a short talk on reproducibility
contents: In this session, we kick-off the R user meeting for Amsterdam UMC (RUM-UMC) with personal introductions, a conversation to find out peopleâ€™s preferences for format and timings (e.g., frequency of meets, hybrid), followed by a brief talk about how to make your R workflow reproducible.
